DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact Teen Choice program reduce rate unprotected sex high risk youth New York .
DOC.detailed_description: This study use randomize controlled design compare impact Teen Choice Program `` business-as-usual '' school curriculum . The Teen Choice curriculum design adolescent age 12 19 deliver different format range length 6 12 week . Teen Choice offer regular school day middle high school age youth . This study conduct part national Personal Responsibility Education Program evaluation fund Administration Children Families within U.S. Department Health Human Services .
